Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Tracy M.
Reviews.Content: I think that this phone was great because of the price along with the features. It was under my $150 price limit and had many things that I could do on it such as edit my pictures with many features involved such as cartoon, and warp it in very different ways. I really liked the camera as well as the touch screen because it was very sensitive and there was no difficulty at all. My finger glided on the surface and the phone reacted with great response.Pros: Many features such as Wifi, GPS, camera, Google, Social media on the menu, and many apps.Cons: The only thing that I didn't really like when I bought this phone was that there was no Qwerty keypad which made my texting a little more difficult, but I could manage.Overall, it was a great phone!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone 'I love it'
Reviews.Author: fastjanow
Reviews.Content: I received this phone today I'm so glad I went ahead and ordered it. All the stories I have read over the last two weeks had me really going. It's the best phone I have ever had. I got 2 CD'S from Kies and what a treat they are.I downloaded them on my PC tomorrow I'll hook up my phone and download oddles of goodies into my phone. I'm in south fla.my phone came ups from Orlando, It's not in POlISH or what have you.Don't be afarid just get it.

Reviews.Title: excellent item, who says that is a bad phone
Reviews.Author: Najib Maiwand "Jay Maiwand"
Reviews.Content: after long search..i found this phone an excellent phone..i bought like 6 phone from azaman and returned it back to them..even nokia newest one they sucks..when i bought this phone man i love it..what ever i wanted in the phone it has it..it worth every penny..i love it..

Reviews.Title: A very good Android mobile for begginers
Reviews.Author: shaun
Reviews.Content: I paid $120 for this mobile as i wanted to try Android mobile, I had a touch mobile but that was on a windows OS. This one is clearly better and is good for beginners. It has a good sensitive touch screen, not too large or too small.I connected it to my home wireless internet and it connected finrr, he browser and gadgets installed are good enough. we cant compare it with IPHONE or High end touch mobiles though. I would say really worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 5620 Monte
Reviews.Author: Carolyn R. Johnson "loves shoes"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone 2 years ago! I could never configure it to work here in the US other than get calls and make calls. The message set up I could never configure. On a positive note I could down load music,for my Kizomba selections,however now it is an alarm clock!

Reviews.Title: Samsung S5620
Reviews.Author: Onyxsquared
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone and I have used it often.  The pictures are good.  I have not used it for the internet though.

Reviews.Title: It did the job for the price
Reviews.Author: kendall wigoda
Reviews.Content: I found the phone very difficult to use. It worked well but the technology was average at best. However, it did the job, short-term.

Reviews.Title: Worked perfectly
Reviews.Author: Marjorie J. Meyer "Shoe Lover"
Reviews.Content: We traveled from Spain to Italy, buying a new SIM card for each country. The phone worked perfectly and has some great bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: Very good team.
Reviews.Author: Jose Leonardo Leon
Reviews.Content: Very good team. It works perfectly, so far I have not had any problems. I recommend it for anyone who wants a basic phone with internet connection.

Reviews.Title: battery life is not that long.
Reviews.Author: wenyh
Reviews.Content: The cell phone is easy to use. Design is fashion. But the battery life is not as long as description. I don't use the phone often, just make call and answer call, about 10 times a day. I have to charge it every other day.

Reviews.Title: Dissappointed
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: I was very dissappointed when I received the Monte in the mail... It's smaller than I expected and it doesn't allow me to use my mms because it is not an AT&T; phone which I did not know when I purchased it.  There's certain things I hate about it and things I like about it.  Lesson learned never buy a phone offline unless you've already seen it in person and know for sure what your getting..
